casename: Gladioli Investments Pte Ltd v Montien International Limited and Another
counsel: Andrew Ang (Rajah & Tann) for the plaintiff; Steven Lee (Hilborne & Co) for both defendants
tags-parsed: Contract/Contractual terms/Ambiguity in the provisions of sale and purchase agreement/Two conflicting clauses providing for different rates of interests payable in event of default/Whether extraneous documents may be adduced to shed light on intention of parties.
